trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_SEQ_00<tab>Sphene stands in silence.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_TODO_01<tab>Contact your allies from the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Milos in residential radius 9-14.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GATE05304_000_000<tab>Heading below? I'd be glad to show you the way!
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>Proceed to the throne room?
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_000_010<tab>The Endless Sphene was just a projected image outside Living Memory, so it was a bit of a surprise to see an actual item that belonged to her.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_100_010<tab>On the way back, I asked Shale why the tiara might have been in the throne room.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_101_010<tab>She believes that it was being used to record Sphene's actions. There's no way to tell now whether or not it was with her knowledge...
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_102_010<tab>But it can't be used for questionable ends anymore, so we can at least take comfort in that.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GULOOLJA_000_011<tab>I'm glad everyone's safe!
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_KRILE_000_012<tab>The interference made it impossible to locate you, and prevented linkpearl transmissions besides...
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_KRILE_000_013<tab>Apologies that we couldn't be there for the critical moment, but as usual you found a way to handle matters.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GRAHATIA_000_014<tab>Calyx seems to consider the reflections naught but fields to be harvested for his Endless.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GRAHATIA_000_015<tab>I do not make a habit of dismissing the assertions of others out of hand, but I cannot abide such callous disregard for life.

TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_SHALE_000_016<tab>Based on the geographic data I gathered, it seems the inner section containing the castle served as a residential area during the early stages of Everkeep's construction.

TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_SHALE_000_017<tab>The outer section was then added when they expanded the structure into its present-day shape. I expect the system to dry the earth was installed so that they could build a stable foundation on submerged land.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_020<tab>The simulant gave the impression that she wouldn't be back, but I suppose only time will tell. And at present, we have no further leads on Calyx...
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GRAHATIA_000_021<tab>For now, perhaps you could take a moment to contact our friends.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GRAHATIA_000_022<tab>It would be good to catch each other up on recent developments, and I am certain everyone would appreciate hearing from you.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>Come to think of it, I have no idea what Erenville's up to...
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GULOOLJA_000_024<tab>I'll take a look at the Preservation terminal. Hopefully there'll be something useful.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_025<tab>I shall take the opportunity to review the books from the castle...and one grimoire in particular.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_KRILE_000_026<tab>Most of the tomes we found were dilapidated from age, but some are thankfully still legible.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GRAHATIA_000_027<tab>Y'shtola, Alphinaud, Alisaie, and Erenville should all be somewhere within the dome. Pray do the honors in any order you like.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_SHALE_000_028<tab>It irks me to think we're being led on by Calyx, but I'll do my best to find clues of his passage.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_Q1_000_030<tab>Who will you contact?
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_A1_000_001<tab>Y'shtola.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_A1_000_002<tab>Alphinaud.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_A1_000_003<tab>Alisaie.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_A1_000_004<tab>Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_YSHTOLA_000_031<tab>(-Y'shtola-)If it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Is something the matter?
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_YSHTOLA_000_032<tab>(-Y'shtola-)...So Preservation is behind the recent intrigue. It doesn't surprise me. I'm glad to hear you are none the worse for your trials, though.

TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>(-Y'shtola-)As for myself, I've just concluded a meeting with Gossan. I told him about the cure for levin sickness, and we formed a tentative plan to treat all those who are stricken.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_YSHTOLA_000_034<tab>(-Y'shtola-)I'm now otherwise unoccupied, so I shall take a look around the government sector to see if aught is amiss.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>(-Y'shtola-)And if this Calyx is obsessed with the key, then I ought to begin studying it in earnest as well.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALPHINAUD_000_036<tab>(-Alphinaud-)Ah, excellent timing, my friend. I had a mind to call you myself to see how you were faring.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALPHINAUD_000_037<tab>(-Alphinaud-)Calyx... While something was obviously afoot, I couldn't have imagined that such an individual would be involved.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALPHINAUD_100_037<tab>(-Alphinaud-)'Tis well you were able to prevent the simulant from sowing further uncertainty. That said, her absence may have consequences.

TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALPHINAUD_000_038<tab>(-Alphinaud-)The people of Alexandria still have great trust in Sphene─'tis plain in the way they speak of her even now, and in how the simulant was able to win them over.

TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALPHINAUD_000_039<tab>(-Alphinaud-)When they notice she has ceased to appear again, rumor and worry will spread. We must be mindful of any pronounced shift in the mood of the populace.

TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>(-Alphinaud-)But forgive me─it's been battle after battle for you, hasn't it? We can handle ourselves for now, so pray rest up while you can and recover your strength.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>(-Alisaie-)Yes, hello! ...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? For you to call out of the blue, is something wrong?
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALISAIE_000_042<tab>(-Alisaie-)...What? You went all the way to the bottom of Everkeep, and you didn't think to ask me to come!?
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALISAIE_100_042<tab>(-Alisaie-)<sigh> But I suppose I've been fairly busy myself...
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALISAIE_000_043<tab>(-Alisaie-)I'm pleased to say that we've received permission to begin administering the cure for levin sickness to citizens.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALISAIE_000_044<tab>(-Alisaie-)I'm actually due to visit a boy named Milos shortly, to see how he is responding to his treatment.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALISAIE_000_045<tab>(-Alisaie-)You've met him before with Lamaty'i, I believe? The two of you should attend as well if you have time.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ERENVILLE_000_046<tab>(-Erenville-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this is a surprise. Has Wuk Lamat gotten into trouble again?
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ERENVILLE_000_047<tab>(-Erenville-)...I see. Knowing you, I expect you're already looking forward to the next obvious trap. Try not to overdo it.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ERENVILLE_000_048<tab>(-Erenville-)I'm in the outskirts at the moment. I've been helping the people with their work, and talking to those I meet to gauge their sentiment.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ERENVILLE_100_048<tab>(-Erenville-)It's been uneventful for the most part, but there was one notable development.

TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ERENVILLE_000_049<tab>(-Erenville-)Following recent events, some here stopped wearing regulators. This has led to a disparity in what people remember about the queen's death, and the occasional episode of confusion.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ERENVILLE_000_050<tab>(-Erenville-)I'll be sure to let you know if there are any other changes.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_000_051<tab>Being able to contact people so far away so easily can do wonders for your peace of mind. Linkpearls really are convenient things.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_KRILE_000_052<tab>I see you were able to reach everyone. That is well.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GRAHATIA_000_053<tab>I thought I heard Alisaie yelling. I hope everything is all right...
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_060<tab>What did the others have to say, if I may ask?
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_000_061<tab>They've finished treating Milos? Then we have to go and visit him!
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_062<tab>Would you mind if I accompanied you? I understand he's afflicted with the selfsame condition as I was, and I cannot help but worry for him.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_000_063<tab>Of course, we don't mind at all.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_KRILE_000_064<tab>In the meantime, I shall take myself around Solution Nine and see how things are.

TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_KRILE_000_065<tab>I share Alphinaud's concern about the queen's absence. And even setting that aside, the situation is not like to resolve itself while becoming Endless remains an option.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GRAHATIA_000_066<tab>I had been meaning to visit some shops, so I shall join Krile.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_SHALE_000_067<tab>While everyone's out and about, I'll try to pick up Calyx's trail. I'll see if I can dig up some information about the key for Y'shtola as well.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GULOOLJA_000_068<tab>I'll help you!
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_069<tab>It seems we all have things to do. Still, there's no telling what else Calyx might have planned...so please be careful, everyone.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>Right, let's go to Milos's apartment. It's in residential radius 9-14, if I remember correctly.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GULOOLJA_000_071<tab>Lamaty'i told me all about Milos. She said he was around my age, but couldn't leave his bed.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_GULOOLJA_000_072<tab>I'd like to go meet him next time. Maybe we can be friends.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_SHALE_000_073<tab>Calyx is more clever than anyone has any right to be, but I'll sniff him out somehow. Just leave it to me.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_WUKLAMAT_000_074<tab>Look, Milos is sitting up! I'd seen the treatment before, so I knew it would work...but it's still so amazing! Alisaie and Y'shtola are miracle workers!
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_075<tab>I understand my Endless self visited Milos often. I will keep quiet, so as to not draw suspicion.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALISAIE_000_076<tab>There you are. Next time something is in the offing, you had better remember to call on me!
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ISADORA_000_077<tab>It's so good to see you again, and a delight to know that you and Alisaie are friends. She's been very kind to us.
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_MILOS_000_080<tab>H-Hello... You came before...with Queen Sphene... I'm glad...I'm glad you came again...
TEXT_KINGMH107_05305_ALISAIE_000_081<tab>I believe he'll be fine now. But just for good measure, I'll administer a healing spell.
